func.title: CastObjects

param.name: x
param.desc: X casting position. In local calls offset to the calling object.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y casting position. In local calls offset to the calling object.

param.name: angle
param.desc: Angle into which to cast the objects.

param.name: angle_variance
param.desc: Maximum deviation from that angle. If not given objects will be cast into all directions.

func.desc: Casts number objects at the specified position with speed level. For local calls the created objects will have the same owner as the calling object. The objects that were created are returned in an array.

example.text: Creates a spark at the last vertex of a line. With multiple calls this will create the same effect as a lightning strike.
